author: Xbox
description:
Available now on Xbox Series X|S

The next chapter in the beloved minimalist city-building franchise is here. ISLANDERS: New Shores invites you back to a world of tranquil creativity, now reimagined with expanded gameplay, stunning visuals, and a host of fresh features that build on the charm of the original.

Whether you're a longtime fan or a newcomer, prepare to explore, build, and strategize like never before.

https://www.xbox.com/games/store/islanders-new-shores/9PL354PNMMRD

title: ISLANDERS: New Shores | Launch Trailer

author: Xbox
description:
It's high time we formally introduced you to Vex the Siren, one of the four all-new Vault Hunters who are wreaking havoc on Kairos in Borderlands 4!

If you're generally a fan of companion classes or like to rack up kills with elemental damage, Vex is a great choice.

We’ll be rolling out a Gameplay Overview, Character Short, and Vault Hunter page for Rafa, Amon, and Harlowe in the coming weeks – so stay tuned!

Borderlands 4 is now available for pre-order on Xbox Series X|S!
https://www.xbox.com/games/store/borderlands-4/9NVSKL161M60

author: Xbox
description:
Coming to Xbox on September 4, 2025

Enter the dark realms of Norse mythology in Jotunnslayer: Hordes of Hel, a gripping rogue-like horde-survivor where survival is earned in blood. Fight relentless waves of enemies, harness the divine power of ancient Viking deities, and become a god-like warrior in the ultimate battle against the forces of Hel.

Rogue-like combat meets mythic mayhem
Unlock divine blessings and powerful abilities
Explore brutal Norse realms
Face epic bosses and endless hordes

Do you have what it takes to survive?

📅 Launching on Xbox | September 4, 2025
🔔 Subscribe and turn on notifications for more updates!
